name: Guns & Bones
description:
Guns N Bones is a mix of the best elements in the First Person Shooter and Tower Defense genres. Combined with a skill tree and a map that adapts over time, the approach to each level changes drastically depending on how you play.

✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧

 

Objective

You play as a mercenary in a deserted city and your mission is to protect it from hordes of infected enemies to prevent their expansion and the consequent extinction of humanity.

✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧

 

Team

Ryan Palazón - Game Designer, Producer & Programmer

Marc Romera - Lead Programmer & Level Designer

✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧

 

Controls

Move: W, A, S, D

Jump: Space

Shoot: Left Click

Open skill tree: U

Start wave: F

Use active skill (if possible): Left Shift

Place trap in build mode: Left Click (when in build mode)

Scroll between traps in build mode: Mouse wheel

Take trap in build mode: Q

✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧✧

 

Installation guide

To execute Guns&Bones, first unzip Guns&Bones.zip. Then execute the .exe file.

-We recommend the use of headphones-

Game still under development. Feedback is appreciated!

Thanks for playing, from the Orange Flag team.
